speaker: Donald Trump
sentence: When I say the president, I'm talking about past administration made a horrible deal giving $150 billion, giving $1.8 billion in cash -- in actual cash carried out in barrels and in boxes from airplanes.
politifact_statement: The Obama administration "made a horrible deal giving 150 billion, giving 1.8 billion in cash  in actual cash carried out in barrels and in boxes from airplanes" to Iran.
verified_claim: The nuclear deal gave Iran "150 billion, giving 1.8 billion in cash  in actual cash carried out in barrels and in boxes from airplanes."
verified_claim_article_title: Donald Trump says Iran got 150 billion and 1.8 billion in cash. That's Half True
